subject: Frank sumptions the other woman pic enhanced !
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey everybody,
I have been working with itc images for a long time and I took the 
liberty of enhancing Frank's pic of the double face. I adjusted 
brightness, contrast, curves and levels to bring out what was hidden 
from the naked eye and there where quite a few spirit images in the 
capture and what was thought to be a woman was actually a man with a 
beard.

I'm posting it in the photo section under Frank's pic.
